senselogic.sitevision.api.security

Interface MessageDigesterFactory


  • @Requireable(value="MessageDigesterFactory")
public interface MessageDigesterFactory
    Factory that provides message digester instances that can perform hash computation using a specific algorithm.

    Message digests are secure one-way hash functions that take arbitrary-sized data and output a fixed-length hash value. This factory provides instances that supports common message digest algorithms, such as MD5 and SHA-256.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getMessageDigesterFactory(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 5.0.1
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
